column1: You've got the devil in your eyes
column3: You went and took me by surprise
column4: 你用惊喜吸引我，带着我前进
column5: Say what you wanna say I won't go back
column6: 说你想说的，不管说什么我都不会回头
column7: If you wanna hit the road then let's go then
column8: 如果你想上路，那我们就走吧
column9: Let's just go and see the world and show them
column10: 让我们去看看这个世界，向他们展示一下能耐
column11: What it really means to live life golden
column12: 把人生过得有价值的真正意义是什么
column14: 我们是有价值的，宝贝，我们有存在的意义
column15: Yeah they about to see a shine cause we're golden
column16: 耶，他们即将看到我们的光辉，因为我们是有价值的
column17: They can never break us down cause we're golden
column18: 他们永远无法打败我们，因为我们有存在的意义
column19: They about to see us glow cause we're golden
column20: 他们即将看到我们的闪耀，因为我们是一种特别的存在
